Read Dirty Sims Gossip <font color = '#E22DE7'>(+1 SP ☆) </font>
{2.SimName} was seen stealing from a homless sim.
Someone reported that {2.SimName} tried to force {M2.him}{F2.her}self on them.
A restaurant reported that {2.SimName} tried to leave without paying the bill.
{2.SimName} was once sent to jail for avoiding taxes.
{2.SimName}'s Ex said that {M2.he}{F2.she} didn't take a shower for weeks!
{2.SimName}'s friends said that {M2.he}{F2.she} would leave them starving whenever they had a sleepover at {M2.his}{F2.her} place.
A DJ reported that {2.SimName} kept offering sexual favors to have him play {M2.his}{F2.her} recordings in the club.
{2.SimName} was once seen digging in the trash.
A friend of {2.SimName} said that {M2.he}{F2.she} once ditched her because {M2.he}{F2.she} was embarrassed of the outfit she was wearing.
{2.SimName} once released a naked photo of {M2.him}{F2.her}self on the internet.
{2.SimName} once pushed an elderly lady that resulted in her breaking a leg.
{2.SimName} was seen taken drugs at a local club.
{2.SimName}'s ex said that they ended their relationship because {M2.he}{F2.she} was cheating on them with 5 different sims.
{2.SimName} once got so drunk that {M2.he}{F2.she} ended up peeing on sims in the club.
A group of children said that {2.SimName} once tried to lure them into {M2.his}{F2.her} car claiming that {M2.he}{F2.she} had free candy.
{2.SimName}'s teacher said that {M2.he}{F2.she} failed all of her classes but paid the school to get a false degree.
{2.SimName}'s parents said that {M2.he}{F2.she} was found near a trashcan when they decided to adopt {M2.him}{F2.her}.
Word on the street that {2.SimName} secretly murdered someone and got away with it.

Help A Sim With Social Advice (In Person) <font color = '#fc90fb'>(+5 SP ☆) </font>
Hello, I'm having a problem making new friends, can you give me an advice that would help me out?
Hello, I'm having a problem turning sims on, can you give me an advice that would help me out?
Hello, I'm having a problem with baby setting, can you give me an advice that would help me out?
Hello, I'm having a problem with my self confidence, can you give me an advice that would help me out?
Hello, I'm having a problem with my drug addiction, can you give me an advice that would help me out?
Hello, I'm having a problem hoeing it up! Can you give me an advice that would help me out?
Hello, I'm having anger control issues! Can you give me an advice that would help me out?
Hello, I'm having a problem spicing it up in bed, can you give me an advice that would help me out?
Hello, I'm having skin issues, can you give me an advice that would help me out?
Hello, I'm having some eating disorders, can you give me an advice that would help me out?
Give A Positive Advice <font color = '#E22DE7'>(+5 SP ☆) </font>
Thank you so much! I will do exactly what you've told me.
Give A Negative Advice <font color = '#E22DE7'>(+5 SP ☆) </font>

Hello, I've been feeling inscure about my fashion choices... \n can you tell me if my outfit looks good?
Thank you! I'm glad that you like it.
Thank you so much! I feel much more confident about myself now.

Hello, I've been struggling to gain popularity & I think you can help me out... \n All I want is a selfie with you.
Thank you! I'm sure this will bring me a lot of followers.
Help A Sim With Their Crush <font color = '#E22DE7'>(+5 SP ☆) </font>
Hello, I've been having a crush on a sim for a long while, but I'm too afraid to let them know... \n \n Can you please tell them about how I feel? I will highly appreciate that!

WOW! YOU'RE THE BEST!!! MY LOVE FANTASY WILL NOW COME TRUE!
{0.SimFirstName} has ruined {1.SimFirstName}'s relationship with the crushing sim!

{0.SimFirstName} is proud of {M0.him}{F0.her}self for helping a sim in a social situation, how lovely.
Thank you for purchasing from "The Plastics" online shop, while you're somewhat fetch for doing that...... you still can't sit with us.
{0.SimFirstName} is enjoying the world of drama and tea spilling, despite it being somewhat cringey {M0.he}{F0.she}'s getting an adrenaline rush from it.
{0.SimFirstName} is LIVING for the new dirty secret {M0.he}{F0.she} has obtained, how juicy!
Request Permession To <font color = '#E22DE7'>"The Plastics"</font> Website
Not so fast baby, I only grant access to popular people. \n{0.SimFirstName} needs <font color = '#fc90fb'>(25 SP ☆ )</font> to be granted access.
Here you go sweetie, you can now access the website from your phone.\n{0.SimFirstName} can now purchase <font color = '#fc90fb'>The Burn Book</font>.

{0.SimFirstName} has to learn this skill from Melinda Rogers <font color = '#E22DE7'>"The Feathers Queen" </font>first.\nYou can talk to Melinda Rogers by inviting <font color = '#E22DE7'>"The Feathers"</font> club over from the "Social Popularity" menu.

You want ME to teach you??! IN YOUR DREAMS...\n{0.SimFirstName} needs <font color = '#fc90fb'>(25 SP ☆ )</font> to be taught.
{0.SimFirstName} has learned to build friendships with other sims quickly.\nYou can find the new interaction in the "Life's Drama Dirty Secrets" piemenu when clicking on a target sim.
